DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of MK-0431/ONO-5435 in patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus who have inadequate glycemic control on diet/exercise therapy and glimepiride as monotherapy
DOC.brief_title: Controlled Study of MK-0431/ONO-5435 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus on diet/exercise therapy and glimepiride as monotherapy Patients with Type 1 diabetes mellitus
